post.body: Take any type of prescribed medication to get you through the Power Point presentation, er, end credits.
They were together, then she left, then she came back, then they ended up on an island. Seriously. Did U watch to end of credits?
Yes, I Twittered that in my world, "I Want To Believe" doesn't exist; however, aliens do.
ROFL! It's good to know I am in good company. ;-)
was correct regarding my crappy chocolate chip cookies: I used baking powder in place of baking soda. DUH! Redo in order.
Yes! I shop eBay a lot during the holiday season! I'll probably start shopping eBay more, 'cos I crave "unique."
Found the image I was looking for. Almost done with the graphics on The Blog's sidebar.
Programs on computer are moving so slow and my mind is moving so fast.
Seriously did not think it would be this hard to find image of pin-up girl next to a filing cabinet...
Wishing I'd met Chris Carter back when I was dating 1 on his fave authors, so I could've kicked him in balls 4 making sucky movie in future.
X-Files movie more like Invasion of the Body Snatchers: those characters were NOT Mulder and Scully!
Freakin' amazing sunset! No wonder people say CdM reminds 'em of Hawaii! Santa Catalina Island + San Clemente Island looked HUGE and CLOSE!
After watching Robin on General Hospital for 23 yrs, I'm glad I didn't miss her wedding.I think as a kid,the actress had crush on my friend.
Look Sick. Sound Sick. Feel Sick. Hope I'm not getting Sick.
Every time I see Craftster on my Blog, I think it reads Canters as in Canter's Deli as in potato salad + pancakes @ 2AM w/pimps+celebrities.
Feel sick. About 2 start massive housework, but keeping notebook nearby 2 draft blog post. Also thinking positive thoughts for @karendinino.
Nicky Cage: while U were leaving out here in our 'hood, why didn't you ask our fellow resident, Dean Koontz, for his hair transplant doctor?
Can't wait for Wednesday ... Twilight Zone marathon on Sci-Fi!
Still working on The Blog's sidebar content. Wishing Firefox hadn't lost all my freakin' links! http://www.thehappyhooker.blogspot.com/
Seriously in LOVE with Wall-E! Must get the Ultimate Wall-E Robot toy! But I would have 2 get an EVE toy too, 'cos I don't want 'em parted.
